PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.ALSA_SELECTION_DOC:
Modular alsa: used standard alsa pipeline, DSD is resampled to 192kHz PCM
DSD native: Peppymeter use a separate output pipeline, no reformat of DSD, but no input for VU-Meters with connect services
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.ALSA_SELECTION_1: DSD native (no support for connect services)
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.TIMEOUT_DOC:
Timeout in seconds until Peppymeter screensaver starts.

Please set follow options in Touch Display plugin:
- The standard screensaver timeout in TouchScreen plugin should be set higher as than for PeppyMeter
-
- 'No Screensaver while playing' to 'ON'
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.VUMETER_DESC: Available meters are depend on selected 'Active Meter Folder'
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.METER_DOC: Select one VU-Meter of active meter folder
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.LIST_EMPTY: No VU-Meters in list. Revert back to random mode!
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.RANDOMSELECTION_DOC:
Comma separated list of meter names for using, if 'List' selected.
Available meter list for copy and paste:
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.RANDOMINTERVAL_DOC: Time interval until the next meter is displayed
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.NEEDLE_CACHE_DOC: A Raspberry with 1GB RAM and a display resolution of 1920x1080 or 1280x800 is hard at the memory limit. Therefore the cache has to be switched off, in order to save memory. Otherwise, no random or list mode is possible
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.ACTIVE_FOLDER_DOC: Selection of the actively used folder for VU-Meter depend on screen resolution
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.MOUSE_DOC: For a touchscreen enable the mouse support, to have the possibility to stop the screensaver per touch. For a standard HDMI display without touch disable this option
